articles.author: Helen Regan, Kocha Olarn
articles.title: ‘Monumental step forward’: Thailand to become first Southeast Asian nation to legalize same-sex marriage - CNN
articles.description: Thailand will become the first nation in Southeast Asia to legalize same-sex marriage after the kingdom’s Senate approved a marriage equality bill on Tuesday, with supporters calling it a “monumental step forward for LGBTQ+ rights.”

articles.title: Neanderthal DNA Exists in Humans, But One Piece Is Mysteriously Missing - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Neanderthals, the closest cousins of modern humans, lived in parts of Europe and Asia until their extinction some 30,000 years ago.
articles.content:
